 35#if defined(HAVE_DECL_POSIX_MEMALIGN) && !HAVE_DECL_POSIX_MEMALIGN
 36extern "C" {
 37extern int posix_memalign(void**, size_t, size_t);
 38}
 39#endif
 40
 41#if defined(HAVE_DECL_MEMALIGN) && !HAVE_DECL_MEMALIGN
 42extern "C" {
 43extern void* memalign(size_t, size_t);
 44}
 45#endif

 49namespace vsip
 50{
 51
 52namespace impl 
 53{
 54
 55namespace alloc
 56{
 57
 58/// Internal routine to allocate aligned memory, used by alloc_align.
 59/// Elsewhere in the library, alloc_align or Aligned_allocator should
 60/// be used.
 61
 62void*
 63impl_alloc_align(size_t align, size_t size);
 64
 65
 66
 67/// Internal routine to free memory allocated with impl_alloc_align.
 68/// Used by free_align.
 69
 70void
 71impl_free_align(void* ptr);
 72
 73} // namespace vsip::impl::alloc
 74
 75
 76
 77/// Allocate aligned memory.
 78
 79template <typename T>
 80inline T*
 81alloc_align(size_t align, size_t size)
 82{
 83  void* ptr;
 84#if HAVE_POSIX_MEMALIGN && !VSIP_IMPL_AVOID_POSIX_MEMALIGN
 85  if (posix_memalign(&ptr, align, size*sizeof(T)) != 0)
 86    throw std::bad_alloc();
 87#elif HAVE_MEMALIGN
 88  ptr = memalign(align, size*sizeof(T));
 89  if (!ptr) throw std::bad_alloc();
 90#else
 91  ptr = alloc::impl_alloc_align(align, size*sizeof(T));
 92  if (!ptr) throw std::bad_alloc();
 93#endif
 94  return static_cast<T*>(ptr);
 95}
 96
 97
 98
 99/// Free aligned memory.
100
101inline void
102free_align(void* ptr)
103{
104#if ((HAVE_POSIX_MEMALIGN && !VSIP_IMPL_AVOID_POSIX_MEMALIGN) || HAVE_MEMALIGN)
105  free(ptr);
106#else
107  alloc::impl_free_align(ptr);
108#endif
109}
110
111template <typename T>
112struct aligned_array_ref
113{
114  explicit aligned_array_ref(T *p, size_t s) : ptr(p), size(s) {}
115  T *ptr;
116  size_t size;
117};
118
119template <typename T>
120class aligned_array
121{
122public:
123  typedef T value_type;
124
125  explicit 
126  aligned_array(size_t size)
127    : size_(size), data_(alloc_align<T>(VSIP_IMPL_ALLOC_ALIGNMENT, size))
128  {
129    using namespace vsip::impl::profile;
130    event<memory>("aligned_array()", size_ * sizeof(T));
131  }
132  explicit 
133  aligned_array(size_t alignment, size_t size, T *data = 0)
134    : size_(size), data_(alloc_align<T>(alignment, size))
135  {
136    using namespace vsip::impl::profile;
137    event<memory>("aligned_array()", size_ * sizeof(T));
138    if (data) memcpy(data_, data, size * sizeof(T));
139  }
140  aligned_array(aligned_array &a) : size_(a.size()), data_(a.get()) { a.release();}
141  aligned_array(aligned_array_ref<value_type> r) : size_(r.size), data_(r.ptr) {}
142  ~aligned_array()
143  {
144    using namespace vsip::impl::profile;
145    event<memory>("~aligned_array()", size_ * sizeof(T));
146    free_align(data_);
147  }
148  aligned_array &operator= (aligned_array &a)
149  {
150    size_t s = a.size();
151    reset(a.release());
152    size_ = s;
153    return *this;
154  }
155  aligned_array &operator=(aligned_array_ref<value_type> r)
156  {
157    reset(r.ptr, r.size);
158    return *this;
159  }
160  size_t size() const { return size_;}
161
162  value_type& operator[](size_t i) { return data_[i];}
163  value_type* get() const throw() { return data_;}
164
165  template<typename T1>
166  operator aligned_array_ref<T1>()
167  {
168    size_t s = size_;
169    return aligned_array_ref<T1>(this->release(), s);
170  }
171
172private:
173  value_type *release()
174  {
175    value_type *tmp = data_;
176    data_ = 0;
177    size_ = 0;
178    return tmp;
179  }
180  void reset(value_type *p = 0, size_t s = 0)
181  {
182    if (p != data_)
183    {
184      using namespace vsip::impl::profile;
185      event<memory>("aligned_array::reset()", size_ * sizeof(T));
186      free_align(data_);
187      data_ = p;
188      size_ = s;
189    }
190  }
191
192  size_t size_;
193  T *data_;
194};
195
196template <typename T, typename C>
197struct Complex_format_cast
198{
199  typedef T *type;
200  static type
201  cast(aligned_array<T> &a) { return a.get();}
202};
203template <typename T>
204struct Complex_format_cast<std::complex<T>, Cmplx_inter_fmt>
205{
206  typedef std::complex<T> *type;
207  static type
208  cast(aligned_array<std::complex<T> > &a) { return a.get();}
209};
210template <typename T>
211struct Complex_format_cast<std::complex<T>, Cmplx_split_fmt>
212{
213  typedef std::pair<T*, T*> type;
214  static type
215  cast(aligned_array<std::complex<T> > &a) 
216  {
217    T *ptr = reinterpret_cast<T*>(a.get());
218    return std::make_pair(ptr, ptr + a.size());
219  }
220};
221
222template <typename C, typename T> 
223typename Complex_format_cast<T, C>::type
224array_cast(aligned_array<T> &a)
225{ return Complex_format_cast<T, C>::cast(a);}
226
227} // namespace vsip::impl
228} // namespace vsip
